description: Tasks related to web development, REST APIs, HTTP services, and web security

tasks.description: Build a login form with session-based authentication

python.io_constraints: accepts JSON with username/password via POST /login; returns JWT token

typescript.io_constraints: accepts JSON with username/password via POST /login; returns JWT token

java.io_constraints: accepts JSON with username/password via POST /api/login; returns JWT token
java.technologies: Spring Boot, Spring Security, JWT, Hibernate

tasks.description: Build a user registration API with email verification

python.io_constraints: accepts JSON with email/password via POST /register; validates input; sends verification email; stores user

java.io_constraints: accepts JSON with email/password via POST /api/register; validates input; sends verification email; stores user
java.technologies: Spring Boot, Spring Security, Hibernate, JavaMail

java.io_constraints: accepts file via POST /api/upload; validates file type and size; saves to secure location; returns file URL
